No, flushing a cherry bomb or any type of explosive device down the toilet is extremely dangerous and should never be attempted. Cherry bombs are a type of firework that can cause significant damage and injury if they explode. Flushing them down the toilet can lead to a pipe rupture, sewage backup, or even an explosion in the sewer system, which can cause harm to people and damage to property.

If you have any unused or unwanted fireworks, including cherry bombs, it is important to dispose of them safely. Check with your local law enforcement agency or fire department for guidance on how to properly dispose of fireworks in your area.
